languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
languages.original_text:
С помощью {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} расширяет возможности союзников в бою, делая их еще более грозной силой.
Ключевые особенности: предоставление {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительных ходов{/g}, положительные эффекты для одиночных целей, спасение союзников, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Leaders use their Willpower and Fellowship to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: extra turns, single target buffs, ally saving, momentum.

Leaders use their Willpower and Fellowship to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: extra turns, single target buffs, rescuing allies, momentum.

traits.locale_text:
С помощью Воли и Общительности лидер расширяет возможности союзников в бою, делая их еще более грозной силой.
Ключевые особенности: предоставление дополнительных ходов, положительные эффекты для одиночных целей, спасение союзников, моментум.

С помощью Воли и Общительности лидер расширяет возможности союзников в бою, делая их еще более грозной силой.
Ключевые особенности: предоставление дополнительных ходов, положительные эффекты для одиночных целей, спасение союзников, моментум.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}来强化盟友们的战斗力，让他们在战场上更加所向披靡。
核心：{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，单体增益，解救盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
领袖可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}来强化盟友们的战斗力，让他们在战场上更加所向披靡。
核心：{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，单体增益，解救盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficiales{/g} emplean su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} para mejorar las capacidades de combate de sus aliados, convirtiéndolos en amenazas aún mayores en el campo de batalla.
Especialidades: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}, potenciadores de objetivos únicos, rescate de aliados, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Los oficiales emplean su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} para mejorar las capacidades de combate de sus aliados, convirtiéndolos en amenazas aún mayores en el campo de batalla.
Especialidades: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}, potenciadores de objetivos únicos, rescate de aliados, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g} nutzen ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, um die Kampffähigkeiten ihrer Verbündeten zu verbessern und sie zu einer noch größeren Bedrohung auf dem Schlachtfeld zu machen.
Schwerpunkte: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g}, Einzelziel-Buffs, Rettung von Verbündeten, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Offiziere nutzen ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, um die Kampffähigkeiten ihrer Verbündeten zu verbessern und sie zu einer noch größeren Bedrohung auf dem Schlachtfeld zu machen.
Schwerpunkte: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g}, Einzelziel-Buffs, Rettung von Verbündeten, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officiers{/g} utilisent leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} pour améliorer les capacités de combat de leurs alliés, ce qui les rend encore plus redoutables sur le champ de bataille. Points forts : {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}, bonus à cible unique, sauvetage des alliés, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Les Leaders utilisent leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} pour améliorer les capacités de combat de leurs alliés, ce qui les rend encore plus redoutables sur le champ de bataille.
Points forts : {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}, bonus à cible unique, sauvetage des alliés, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を用いて味方の戦闘能力を強化し、戦場における脅威をより大きなものとする。
コアフォーカス：{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}、単体対象バフ、味方救助、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}

Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
リーダーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を用いて味方の戦闘能力を強化し、戦場における脅威をより大きなものとする。
コアフォーカス：{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}、単体対象バフ、味方救助、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}
